profileText: a Representative from Pennsylvania; born in Pittsburgh, Allegheny County, Pa., July 13, 1984; graduated from Bishop Canevin High School, Pittsburgh, Pa., 2002; B.S., United States Naval Academy, Annapolis, Md., 2006; J.D., Georgetown University, Washington, D.C., 2013; United States Navy, 2006-2012; judicial law clerk, United States District Court for the Southern District of New York; lawyer, private practice; faculty, University of Pittsburgh, Pittsburgh, Pa.; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
